title: Request Housekeeping Service
description: An in-house guest requests extra towels and for their trash to be emptied.

tasks.description: Identify the guest by their room number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the guest making the request.

tasks.description: Log the service request for 'extra towels' and 'empty trash' in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly logs the two distinct housekeeping tasks.

tasks.description: Dispatch the request to the housekeeping department and provide the guest with an estimated time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the request to housekeeping and informs the guest it will be handled within 30 minutes.
